name: Telle in the Dungeon
description:
A LOWREZJAM game (64*64 pixel) where you instant teleport to the nearest wall in a maze-puzzle like game.

Controls:
- movement: WASD / arrow keys
- reload Level: R
- next level : D / right arrow key (when finishing the level)

the game consists of 5 levels
level 1 : 3 rooms
level 2 : 3 rooms
level 3 : 3 rooms
level 4 : 5 rooms
level 5 : 5 rooms

sorry for the lack of implementation of a room checkpoint it can be a problem and please if you have any feed back I love to hear it and thanks for playing
